channel.title: Bow freezes Players
channel.description: Hello, every one loves my server that plays, but when they use a Dark bow or Mage bow, it freezes them. I don't know how to fix this and all bows freeze you except the cross bows.

item.title: Bow freezes Players
item.dc:creator: @Sierra Sierra
item.description:
@Sierra wrote:

Zombiedevice:

Where would the codes be wrong? Like , item.java ? would that be the cause or item.cfg… because item.cfg doesn’t really affect nothing but bonuses, alching and shop prices… I’m thinking it’s wrongly put in client.java or item.java.

Client.java Or Range.handler if you have one.

item.title: Bow freezes Players
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

Zombiedevice:

Hello, every one loves my server that plays, but when they use a Dark bow or Mage bow, it freezes them. I don’t know how to fix this and all bows freeze you except the cross bows.

It might have Invalid Gfx on the darkbow Or there Is something Wrong With the codes on dark bow and mage bow.
